pages.text: Like beetroots, carrots can also be roasted. You can also slice them into a smaller, more convenient snack!

pages.title: Cooked Carrot
pages.text: Carrots can be cooked slowly over a campfire, in a furnace, or even more quickly in a smoker.

pages.title: Sliced Carrot
pages.text: Knives can be used to slice carrots into quickly-eaten snacks!
